dooyit.ui

Class UITaskBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UITaskBox

  • public class UITaskBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The UITaskBox class contains the methods to initialize a task view and change its layout and dimensions.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

      This method is used to adjust the task view width depending on the stage width of the application scene.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UITaskBox

        public UITaskBox(UIDayBox parent,
                 Task task)
        This is the constructor method.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent UIDayBox class.
        task - The Task to populate the task view with.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize the UITaskBox class. It is used by the constructor.

      • initTaskCheckBox

        private void initTaskCheckBox()
        This method is used to initialize the check box for the task view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTaskId

        private void initTaskId()
        This method is used to initialize the task id for the task view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTaskPeriod

        private void initTaskPeriod()
        This method is used to initialize the task period for the task view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • setTaskPeriodWidth

        private void setTaskPeriodWidth()
        This method is used to set the width of the task period. It should only be called after the task period has been initialized. It is used by the initTaskPeriod method.

      • isOverdueTask

        private boolean isOverdueTask()
        This method is used to check if the Task is overdue.
        Returns:
        True if the Task is overdue, False otherwise.

      • isEmptyTaskPeriod

        private boolean isEmptyTaskPeriod()
        This method is used to check if the task period is empty.
        Returns:
        True if the task period is empty, False otherwise.

      • isLongTaskPeriod

        private boolean isLongTaskPeriod()
        This method is used to check if the task period string is long.
        Returns:
        True if task period string is long, False otherwise.

      • getTaskPeriodString

        private java.lang.String getTaskPeriodString()
        This method is used to get the task period string.
        Returns:
        The task period string.

      • initTaskCategoryLabel

        private void initTaskCategoryLabel()
        This method is used to initialize the category name displayed in the task view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • setCategoryCircle

        private void setCategoryCircle()
        This method is used to initialize the colored circle of the category in the task view. It is used by the setCategoryCircle method.

      • initTaskName

        private void initTaskName()
        This method is used to initialize the task name. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTaskDetailBox

        private void initTaskDetailBox()
        This method is used to initialize the view box for the task details. This method can only be called after the check box, task id, task period and task name have been initialized. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTaskCategoryBox

        private void initTaskCategoryBox()
        This method is used to initialized the view box for the task's category details. This method can only been called after the category label and category colored circle have been initialized. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initTaskBox

        private void initTaskBox()
        This method is used to initialize the task view. It can only be called after the view boxes for both task details and category details have been initialized. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initListeners

        private void initListeners()
        This method is used to initialize event listeners for the task view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • updateTaskBoxWidth

        private void updateTaskBoxWidth(double stageWidth)
        This method is used to adjust the task view width depending on the stage width of the application scene.
        Parameters:
        stageWidth - The stage width of the application scene.

      • getTaskNameMaxWidth

        private double getTaskNameMaxWidth(double width)
        This method is used to retrieve the max width of the task name label given the width of the task view. It is used by the updateTaskBoxWidth method.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the task view.
        Returns:
        The maximum width of the task name label.

      • updateTaskBoxWidth

        private void updateTaskBoxWidth()
        This is an overloading method for the updateTaskBoxWidth method.

      • getView

        protected javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getView()
        This method is used to retrieve the task view.
        Returns:
        A task view.

      • updatePosition

        protected void updatePosition(double stageWidth)
        This method is used to update the dimensions of the task view.
        Parameters:
        stageWidth - The stage width of the application scene.
